for i in range(0, int(input())):
    x = int(input())
    n = str(input())
    t = n
    i = 0
    j = 1
    c = 0
    while i < len(n) and j < len(n):
        if n[i] == n[j]:
            c = c + 1
        i = i + 1
        j = j + 1
    print(c)

T = int(input())
X = []
for _ in range(T):
    N = int(input())
    S = input()
    c = 0
    for i in range(N - 1):
        if S[i] == S[i + 1]:
            c += 1
    X.append(c)
print(*X, sep='\n')

tc = int(input())
for _ in range(tc):
    n = int(input())
    s = input()
    ones = s.count('1')
    zeroes = n - ones
    changes = 0
    for i in range(n - 1):
        changes += int(s[i]) ^ int(s[i + 1]) != 1
    print(changes)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    f = 0
    n = int(input())
    s = input()
    for i in range(n - 1):
        f += s[i] == s[i + 1]
    print(f)
